title: A Sugar-cane farm in Fiji
creator_credit: Pilgrim Films and Concept Films of Australia
brief_description: Presents a case study of a sugar cane farm in Fiji as an example of cane farming. The yearly agricultural program and mill processes are covered. Also considers the importance of sugar cane to the Fijian economy.
creator_credit_for_label: Pilgrim Films and Concept Films of Australia
